response.overview: With no clue how he came to be imprisoned, drugged and tortured for 15 years, a desperate man seeks revenge on his captors.
response.tagline: Laugh, and the world laughs with you. Weep, and you weep alone.
response.title: Oldboy

release_dates.note: Plain Archive Limited Deluxe Box Edition SteelBook Blu-ray (#4)

results.name: Explaining the Ending of OLDBOY by Park Chan-wook
